Eins der besten Games überhaupt wenn man mit Kollegen daddeln will. Nur armselig ist einfach das Valve durch ihre Unmengen an Skins so dermaßen viel Schotter macht es aber immer noch nicht hin bekommt, im Jahre FUCKING 2020 ein funktionierendes Anti-Cheat Programm zu entwickeln. Mehr Cheater in diesem Game als alles andere... Traurig wie scheiß egal es dem Entwickler sein kann, solange sich die Skins dennoch verkaufen lassen.. Hauptsache Kohle stimmt....und die Operations sind mittlerweile auch nicht mehr die die sie mal waren.... 4 missionen pro woche ist einfach nur nen schlechter Scherz....

I met my wife on this game. She was the most beautiful woman I’ve ever met.
After dating on and off for 4 years, we decided to get married.

We eventually decided to adopt a child because she couldn’t get pregnant,
his name was Jamie. But then things changed for the worst, she started getting sick.

I started to panic, I became angry and confused, but she told me everything is going to be fine, that’s just how she was. She started getting worse and worse everyday, but she kept a brave and positive attitude, I don’t know how she did it.

After she died I was lost for a long time, my son also stopped paying attention at school.
The teachers understood, at first. But after a while they got more and more angry, they called me many times, but I was wrapped up in my own sadness to do anything about it.

As soon as he turned 18 he decided to drop out of school, I understood why he did it, although I encouraged him to stay. At this point I had quite a bit of money saved, so I decided to travel the world with him for a year, It was what we needed both.
He now lives in London with his boyfriend, and I couldn't be more proud.

I haven’t booted up this game in a long time, but after sitting in my apartment without really doing anything since I retired I decided to play it one more time.
And then the tears came rolling, they just couldn't stop coming. My father always told me that crying is for the weak, so I never really let it all out. But I am so glad I did.

She was an Angel. I never fell in love with anyone after her death, because I didn’t need to.

Thank you for creating this game Chris Shanas, it defined my life and who I am as a person.
